summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 13th Avenue South, from Rayview Street to Lander Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 100569 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
